archimate:Capability.name: Business Capability
archimate:Capability.documentation: A capability is an ability that the organisation has, or requires, that enables it to fulfil its objectives. This should avoid a description of how the capability is delivered and should concentrate instead on the outcomes desired. These should ideally be named from the point of view of the organisation but without reference to the structure of the organisation, a structure within the organisation will deliver the capability or contribute to its delivery. Capabilities are more difficult to define than you would expect at first glance but they can and do influence the way an organisation responds to the challenges it faces.
